pages.title: Fusion Crafting
pages.text: Top Chest $(br)First Slot item you want to enchant $(br)Other slots have to be filled with the 'Bases' enchantments $(br2)Side Chests $(br)Every chest has to contain every item of 'Catalysts'. $(br)Use the highlighted Item on the upper chest

pages.title: Fusion Upgrading
pages.text: All enchanted items you want to use go into the top chest. $(br)First Slot item you want to enchant. $(br)Only upgrades enchantment that has highest collective level of input, but only consume the enchantments used to upgrade. $(br)Will consume enchantments even if it doesnt improve. $(br)Use the highlighted Item on the upper chest
